maklon.title: Fertilizer Contract Manufacturing
maklon.subtitle: Private Label Fertilizer Production Services
maklon.heroTitle: Trusted Organic & Biological Fertilizer Contract Manufacturing
maklon.intro: Fertilizer contract manufacturing is a smart solution for those who want to have their own brand of fertilizer products without building a factory. PT Centra Biotech Indonesia provides liquid organic fertilizer contract manufacturing, biological fertilizer, biological insecticide, and biological fungicide services with production capacity up to 3,000 tons per month. With experience since 2010 and complete certifications from the Ministry of Agriculture, we are ready to be your trusted production partner.
maklon.whatIsDesc: Fertilizer contract manufacturing (toll manufacturing) is a fertilizer production service by a third party for the client's brand. In this scheme, the client provides product specifications and packaging design, while the contract manufacturing factory handles the entire production process from raw material procurement, fermentation, quality control, to packaging according to agreed standards.

organic.title: Liquid Organic Fertilizer Manufacturing
organic.desc: High-quality liquid organic fertilizer production with high C-Organic content and complete macro-micro nutrients. Suitable for all types of plants.

biological.title: Biological Fertilizer Manufacturing
biological.desc: Biological fertilizer with superior microorganisms: Trichoderma harzianum, Rhizobium sp., Azospirillum sp., Pseudomonas fluorescens for soil enrichment.

insecticide.title: Biological Insecticide Manufacturing
insecticide.desc: Biological insecticide with Beauveria bassiana and Metarhizium anisopliae for effective and environmentally friendly pest control.
insecticide.cert1: Registered at Ministry of Agriculture RI

fungicide.title: Biological Fungicide Manufacturing
fungicide.desc: Biological fungicide for controlling fungal and bacterial diseases in plants with Trichoderma harzianum and Pseudomonas fluorescens.

maklon.whyTitle: Why Choose Our Contract Manufacturing Services?
maklon.whyExperienceDesc: Established since 2010 with trusted track record in agricultural biotechnology industry
maklon.whyCapacityDesc: Large production capacity to meet national-scale contract manufacturing needs
maklon.whyCertDesc: Ministry of Agriculture RI, SNI Organic LeSOS, NIB, and Industrial Business License
maklon.processTitle: Contract Manufacturing Process at Centra Biotech

processSteps.title: Consultation & Needs Analysis
processSteps.desc: Our team will discuss product specifications, target market, and your needs in detail.

processSteps.title: Formulation & Product Development
processSteps.desc: Our microbiologists will design optimal formulations according to your target plant needs.

processSteps.title: Sample Production & Quality Testing
processSteps.desc: Sample creation for testing and approval before mass production begins.

processSteps.title: Mass Production & Quality Control
processSteps.desc: Production process with strict supervision and QC at every stage to ensure quality.

processSteps.title: Packaging & Labeling
processSteps.desc: Packaging according to your brand design with labels that comply with regulations.

processSteps.title: Delivery & After-Sales Support
processSteps.desc: Delivery throughout Indonesia with ongoing technical support.

maklon.faqTitle: FAQ - Common Questions About Fertilizer Contract Manufacturing

faqs.q: What is fertilizer contract manufacturing service?
faqs.a: Fertilizer contract manufacturing is a fertilizer production service by a third party (manufacturer) for the client's brand. The client provides product specifications and branding, while the contract manufacturing factory handles production, quality control, and packaging according to agreed standards.

faqs.q: What is the production capacity of PT Centra Biotech Indonesia's contract manufacturing?
faqs.a: PT Centra Biotech Indonesia has a contract manufacturing production capacity of up to 3,000 tons per month, equipped with a modern microbial laboratory and high-standard production facilities.

faqs.q: What certifications does the contract manufacturing service have?
faqs.a: Our contract manufacturing service has complete certifications including: Ministry of Agriculture RI Registration Number, SNI Organic Certificate from LeSOS (442-LSO-005-IDN-08-23), NIB (Business Identification Number), and Industrial Business License.

faqs.q: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for fertilizer contract manufacturing?
faqs.a: Minimum order quantity for liquid organic fertilizer contract manufacturing is 1,000 liters per batch. For solid biological fertilizer minimum 500 kg per batch. We also serve large-scale orders up to thousands of tons.

faqs.q: How long is the fertilizer contract manufacturing production process?
faqs.a: The fertilizer contract manufacturing production process takes 2-4 weeks depending on product type and quantity. This time includes raw material preparation, fermentation, quality control, and packaging.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you
contact.teamTitle: Contact the Centra Biotech Indonesia Team
contact.description: We're ready to answer your questions about biotechnology products, agricultural, livestock, and fishery consulting services. Our customer service team has experience providing the best solutions for your agribusiness needs. Please fill out the form below or contact us directly by phone and email. Our headquarters is located in Boyolali, Central Java, with a distribution network throughout Indonesia. PT Centra Biotech Indonesia provides free consulting services for farmers, ranchers, and fish farmers who want to increase their business productivity using environmentally friendly biological products.

seo.homeTitle: PT CBI Centra Biotech Indonesia - Biotechnology Industry Indonesia
seo.homeDescription: PT Centra Biotech Indonesia is a leading biotechnology industry company. Biotechnology for developing countries with quality raw materials. Integrated biotechnology solutions for agriculture, livestock, and fishery in Indonesia.
seo.aboutTitle: About PT CBI - Leading Biotechnology Company in Indonesia
seo.aboutDescription: PT Centra Biotech Indonesia (PT CBI) is a biotechnology company in Indonesia. What is biotech? Biotechnology uses living organisms to produce agricultural products. Learn about biotechnology for sustainable agriculture.
seo.productsDescription: Explore our biotechnology products: biological fertilizers, livestock probiotics, and aquaculture solutions for maximum results.
seo.contactDescription: Contact Centra Biotech Indonesia team for consultation and biotechnology product information.
seo.blogDescription: Latest articles and information about agricultural biotechnology, cultivation tips, and latest innovations.
seo.newsDescription: Latest news and updates about Centra Biotech Indonesia activities, product launches, and developments.
seo.maklonTitle: Fertilizer Contract Manufacturing - Centra Biotech Indonesia
